Hello,

 

Awesome component. Quite easy to use, I have been able to do verything I wanted so far, yet there is still one thing that troubles me :

After displaying all my items, I would like to be able to change the image used for some of these items (a delayed loading I have to implement due to a complex data structure behind it all). I can change the image without any problem in CoverFlowControl.ItemsSource items but these change have no effect graphically.

I tried calling .UpdateLayout(); on this component to force a refresh but to no avail.

 

Any idea on how I could implement my partial delayed loading ?

 

Regards,

Jonathan

Hello,

This will teach me to accept working on a project without having time to study the technology beforehand. With no Silverlight background I completly forgot to implement INotifyPropertyChanged in the items I bound on the control.

Once done, everything works like a charm. Hopes it could helps other .

 

Regards,
